files.title: Core Process Runner for GenFileMap
files.description: This module provides the main entry point for the GenFileMap process, coordinating between specialized modules for processing, cleaning, and reporting.

files.title: Reporting Functionality for GenFileMap
files.description: This module handles report generation and statistics tracking for the GenFileMap application.

files.title: Project Map Generation for GenFileMap
files.description: This module provides functionality for generating project-level file maps, consolidating references to all project files and their file maps.

files.title: Cleaning Functionality for GenFileMap
files.description: This module provides functionality for cleaning file maps and hash files from the codebase.

files.title: Processing Functionality for GenFileMap
files.description: This module provides functionality for processing files and updating them with file maps.

files.title: Directory Hashing Module for GenFileMap
files.description: This module provides functionality for computing directory-level hashes to optimize file processing by only processing directories that have changed.

files.title: Directory Hash-based File Processing Module
files.description: This module provides optimized file processing functionality by using directory-level hashing to only process directories that have changed since the last run.
